data.actual_result: When click on radio buttons of the specific option nothing happens, it stucks until you press the option label itself
data.expected_result: It should work like clicking the label itself we shouldn't able to select multiple option when "all actions" or "all users" selected.
data.short_description: Audit Log Sort Radio Button Bug
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to audit logs - Click filter by user or filter by action (they both have the bug) - Click on radio button itself to select (not the label)
